title: What kind of Developer would you be?

questions.question: What part of a project excites you the most?

options.name: 💻 Doing everything from frontend to backend
🔍 Ensuring the system is safe and secure
😬 I’m just trying not to break everything 😭

questions.question: Which tools or technologies do you enjoy the most?

options.name: 💻 JavaScript frameworks like React or Angular
🎮 Game engines like Unity or Unreal
🤯 Help, I don't understand any of this! 😭

questions.question: How do you prefer working in a team?

options.name: 🎮 Designing fun and immersive game levels
🌐 Taking care of everything, frontend to backend
😬 Hoping I don’t mess things up

questions.question: What problem-solving approach resonates with you?

options.name: 🌐 Finding a balance between front and backend
😬 Just trying to keep things running

questions.question: Which project would you love to lead?

options.name: 🎮 A video game project with stunning graphics
🛡 Securing data for a global enterprise

questions.question: How do you prefer to organize your code?

options.name: 🎨 Keeping UI components modular and reusable
🌐 Structuring both frontend and backend cohesively
🔒 Ensuring code is secure and robust

questions.question: Which development environment would you choose?

options.name: 🎮 Game engines like Unity or Unreal

questions.question: What does your ideal workday look like?

options.name: 🎮 Working on the next big gaming experience
🌐 Building features for both frontend and backend
😬 Trying to get through without breaking things

results.A: You would be a **Backend Developer**! Backend developers focus on building and optimizing the core logic, databases, and server-side functionalities that power the application. You're skilled at creating efficient systems that ensure the app runs smoothly and can scale. You might work with languages like Python, Node.js, or Java, and your role is crucial in handling data, business logic, and performance.
results.B: You would be a **Frontend Developer**! As a frontend developer, you focus on creating the parts of the app that users interact with. Your designs are both functional and aesthetically pleasing, ensuring that users have a smooth and enjoyable experience. You might work with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks like React or Angular, and you collaborate closely with designers to bring their visions to life.
results.C: You would be an **API/Integration Developer**! API developers focus on creating and managing the communication between different systems or components of an application. You are the bridge that ensures data flows smoothly from the backend to the frontend (and vice versa) and between external services. You’re skilled in REST, GraphQL, and various integration tools like Postman, making you an essential part of modern web development.
results.D: You would be a **Data Scientist/Algorithm Developer**! As a data scientist or algorithm developer, your passion lies in crunching numbers, finding patterns, and solving complex problems with data. You might work on machine learning models, data optimization, and algorithm development to provide powerful insights and solutions. Languages like Python, R, or SQL are your bread and butter, and you thrive in turning raw data into actionable knowledge.
results.E: You would be a **Security Engineer**! As a security engineer, you ensure the application and its infrastructure are safe from malicious attacks. You’re highly knowledgeable about encryption, firewalls, and other security protocols that keep data secure. Your expertise helps safeguard sensitive information, making you essential in industries like finance, healthcare, and government where security is paramount.
results.F: You would be a **Quality Assurance Engineer**! QA engineers focus on testing and ensuring that applications work as intended. You find bugs, test different use cases, and ensure the final product meets quality standards before it reaches users. You use automated testing tools and write scripts that simulate real-world scenarios, ensuring the app functions seamlessly and is free of defects.
results.G: You would be a **Game Developer**! Game developers combine creativity and technical skills to bring interactive experiences to life. Whether you're building visually stunning AAA titles or quirky indie games, you're passionate about gameplay mechanics, storytelling, and user immersion. Your toolkit may include Unity, Unreal Engine, and programming languages like C# or C++. You live for creating fun, engaging, and unforgettable gaming experiences!
results.H: You would be a **Full Stack Developer**! As a full stack developer, you're the Swiss Army knife of the development world. You handle both the frontend and backend of applications, seamlessly switching between creating beautiful interfaces and working on core server logic. You have a diverse skill set and might work with databases, APIs, server infrastructure, and JavaScript frameworks. You're the go-to person for end-to-end solutions!
results.I: Sorry, but it seems **programming might not be for you**. Don't worry! We all have different strengths. Maybe try something else or go back and cry to your mommy! 😭 But hey, don’t give up — every expert was once a beginner!
